headline: What Leidos Holdings (LDOS)'s Leadership in Starlab Space Station Assembly Means for Shareholders
summary: In the past week, Starlab Space LLC announced that Leidos will lead U.S.-based assembly, integration, and testing for the Starlab commercial space station, with responsibilities spanning logistics, systems engineering, safety, and mission assurance. This partnership highlights Leidos's growing role in complex aerospace projects and underscores customer trust in its expertise to support high-stakes, next-generation space initiatives. We'll explore how Leidos's involvement with Starlab may...
